extendedInfo.description: Enjoy your free time with friends and beat them all !You can choose from four different play styles.Classical Tap Tap, just tap on enemy icons and other stuff on your side to get better score then your friend.Side defend, tap enemy on your side and spend received points to help you win and gets your friend to trouble.Slingshots, pull and fire your slingshot as fast as you can and spend points for some bonus features and ammo.In duel just try to kill your opponent faster then he kills you..
